unnormalised: Guess what, folks? That Diwali biryani might just cost you a little more this year. State-run oil companies announced a hike in LPG cylinder prices today, leaving many families feeling the pinch.
normalised: Guess what, folks? That Diwali biryani might just cost you a little more this year. State-run oil companies announced a hike in L P G cylinder prices today, leaving many families feeling the pinch.

unnormalised: The price of a 14.2 kg domestic cylinder has seen a jump of Rs. 50, hitting Rs. 1103.50 in Delhi. Ouch! This latest increase comes right before the festival of lights, traditionally a time for feasting and family gatherings.
normalised: The price of a fourteen point two kilogram domestic cylinder has seen a jump of rupee fifty, hitting rupee one thousand one hundred and three point five zero in Delhi. Ouch! This latest increase comes right before the festival of lights, traditionally a time for feasting and family gatherings.

unnormalised: "This is unbelievable! First, the vegetable prices are soaring, and now this?" complained Lakshmi from Chennai, echoing the sentiments of many homemakers across the country.
normalised: "This is unbelievable! First, the vegetable prices are soaring, and now this?" complained Lakshmi from Chennai, echoing the sentiments of many homemakers across the country.

unnormalised: Sources at IOCL cited rising international crude oil prices as the reason. Distribution channels in smaller cities like Patna and Guwahati might see even higher prices due to transportation costs. Will the government step in with subsidies? Only time will tell. For now, enjoy that Diwali ladoo responsibly! Analysts are predicting further fluctuations, so keep an eye out!
normalised: Sources at I O C L cited rising international crude oil prices as the reason. Distribution channels in smaller cities like Patna and Guwahati might see even higher prices due to transportation costs. Will the government step in with subsidies? Only time will tell. For now, enjoy that Diwali ladoo responsibly! Analysts are predicting further fluctuations, so keep an eye out!
